Member Function Documentation

void paper::CpaperObject::getInfo ( Cvar &  var)

Fills var with information about the drawing.

  • changeTime Time of last change.
  • clients Number of joined clients
  • htmlPath Path to html file to edit drawing.
  • thumbPath Path to thumbnail of drawing.
  • version Version of the drawing (increases with every change)
